metas.name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
metas.description: Visually stunning animation, exciting adventure, and relatable characters, similar to the action and animation of Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Encanto
metas.description: Enchanting music, vibrant animation, and a heartwarming family story, echoing the musical elements of Sing and Coco.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon
metas.description: Epic adventure, beautiful animation, and a strong friendship theme, fitting the adventure and animation preferences seen in Brave and Tangled.

metas.name: Moana
metas.description: Inspiring adventure, catchy songs, and a strong female lead, similar to the musical and adventure aspects of Sing and Tangled.

metas.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
metas.description: Hilarious and inventive animation with a fun, silly premise, aligning with the comedic and animated style of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Trolls
metas.description: Joyful music, colorful animation, and a positive message, a good match for the musical comedies like Sing.

metas.name: Paddington
metas.description: Charming and funny family comedy with a lovable protagonist, similar to the lighthearted fun of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: Paddington 2
metas.description: Continues the delightful humor and heartwarming adventures of Paddington, maintaining the family comedy appeal.

metas.name: The LEGO Movie
metas.description: Clever humor, imaginative animation, and an exciting adventure, resonating with the creative and comedic elements of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Arthur Christmas
metas.description: Funny and heartwarming Christmas adventure with excellent animation and a unique concept, similar to the animated adventure of Tangled.

metas.name: Klaus
metas.description: Beautifully animated and heartwarming story with a touch of magic and humor, appealing to fans of Studio Ghibli's charm and animated adventures.

metas.name: The Mitchells vs. the Machines
metas.description: Hilarious and action-packed animated adventure with a unique visual style and relatable family dynamics, akin to Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Luca
metas.description: A charming animated story about friendship and summer adventures with beautiful visuals, fitting the fantasy and family animation preference.

metas.name: Onward
metas.description: A magical adventure with a focus on family and overcoming challenges, similar to the fantasy adventure of Brave and The Borrowers.

metas.name: Rio
metas.description: Vibrant animation, fun music, and a jungle adventure, a good match for the animated musical adventures seen in Sing.

metas.name: Rio 2
metas.description: Continues the musical and adventure elements with colorful settings and engaging characters.

metas.name: Megamind
metas.description: Clever superhero comedy with engaging animation and witty dialogue, similar to the comedic and animated style of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Shrek 2
metas.description: Continues the beloved humor and fantasy of the original Shrek with new characters and adventures.

metas.name: Shrek the Third
metas.description: More fairy tale fun and comedy with the familiar Shrek cast.

metas.name: Madagascar
metas.description: Funny animated adventure with a group of zoo animals on an unexpected journey, similar to the comedic adventure of Zootopia.

metas.name: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
metas.description: Continues the comedic adventures of the Madagascar characters with new locations and challenges.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 2
metas.description: Exciting martial arts action, humor, and impressive animation, a direct sequel for fans of Kung Fu Panda.

metas.name: Kung Fu Panda 3
metas.description: Further adventures of Po with more focus on family and mastering his skills, keeping the animated comedy and adventure.

metas.name: The Emperor's New Groove
metas.description: Hilarious animated comedy with a unique visual style and fast-paced humor, akin to the comedy of Shrek and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: Aladdin
metas.description: Classic Disney animated musical adventure with catchy songs and a beloved story, similar to the musical and adventure elements of Tangled and Coco.

metas.name: The Princess and the Frog
metas.description: A magical animated musical adventure with a strong story and engaging characters, resonating with the animation and music of Coco and Sing.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
metas.description: Continues the thrilling adventures of Hiccup and Toothless with even more epic scope and emotional depth.

metas.name: How to Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
metas.description: The heartwarming conclusion to the dragon trilogy, offering beautiful animation and a satisfying story.

metas.name: Ratatouille
metas.description: Charming animated story about passion and achieving dreams with beautiful Parisian visuals and heartfelt humor, aligning with the artistic and family appeal of Kiki's Delivery Service and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
metas.description: Stop-motion animation with a witty script and a charming adventure, similar to the unique style and humor of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: ParaNorman
metas.description: A quirky and visually unique stop-motion animation with a fun adventure and a positive message about being yourself, appealing to fans of unique animation.

metas.name: The Little Prince
metas.description: A visually beautiful and philosophical animated film that blends fantasy and life lessons, reminiscent of the thoughtful fantasy of Studio Ghibli films.

metas.name: Kubo and the Two Strings
metas.description: Stunning stop-motion animation and a captivating fantasy adventure inspired by Japanese folklore, appealing to fans of adventure and intricate animation.

metas.name: Chicken Run
metas.description: Hilarious stop-motion animated comedy with a plucky group of chickens trying to escape their farm, similar to the comedic adventures of Wallace & Gromit.

metas.name: The Secret of Kells
metas.description: Beautifully hand-drawn animation with a magical Celtic-inspired adventure and a focus on art and storytelling, appealing to fans of artistic animation like Studio Ghibli.

metas.name: Song of the Sea
metas.description: Another visually breathtaking animated film with a touching story rooted in Irish folklore and themes of family and loss, echoing the magic of Ponyo and My Neighbor Totoro.

metas.name: Ernest & Celestine
metas.description: A charming and gentle animated film with a unique watercolor art style and a heartwarming story about an unlikely friendship, fitting the artistic and family-friendly animation category.

metas.name: Mary and the Witch's Flower
metas.description: A magical adventure from Studio Ponoc, evoking the whimsical and fantastical elements found in Kiki's Delivery Service and Ponyo.

metas.name: Spies in Disguise
metas.description: Action-packed animated comedy with a fun premise and exciting spy missions, aligning with the animated adventure and comedy of Zootopia and The Bad Guys.

metas.name: The Addams Family
metas.description: A fun, quirky animated take on the classic characters with plenty of humor and a unique visual style, fitting the animated comedy and family-friendly criteria.
